error_message.error: An error occurred while displaying your own account.
error_message.passwordError: An error occurred while sending an email to change the password.
error_message.emailError: An error occurred while changing the email address.
error_message.sameEmail: This is your current email address.
error_message.emailAlreadyInUse: This email address is already associated with another account.
error_message.accessDenied: You do not have permission to change roles.
error_message.notAllowedRoles: You cannot change to a role higher than your current role.
error_message.roleError: An error occurred while changing the role.
error_message.refreshToken: An error occurred, please log in again.

info_message.password: An email has been sent to change the password.
info_message.email: The email address has been changed.
info_message.roleRevokeUser: You are no longer a user.
info_message.roleRevokeVolunteer: You are no longer a volunteer.
